Articles.Content:
I suggest the idea of a counter to allow you to do a set amount of rotations around a planet. This would allow it to go in warp around the planet automatically so many times and then stop. This could be useful for mining/ISRUs or aerobraking or anything else you can think of. To allow aerobreaking It could not permit  warp when it hits atmosphere to allow non physics warped entry time. This could be done by not permitting the counter mode to not use any physics warps and only use railed version of warp, but always go max permissable warp per given the situation(like the current warp. The difference being it would pick back up the rails warp when it can again until the given rotations have ticked down. Then it automatically goes max given the ships specific situation.

Edited June 3, 2016 by Arugela
